resources.string: "LEARN FORWARD" this app is specially developed from a student point of view. Now a days websites are vanishing because the server is often down and it does not provide secure authentication for the students to view the website.This app also allows teachers to upload the information they want to provide the students which is not possible in the app In this app there are many more features like viewing any kind of notice in image, text, pdf form the curriculum which is provided by the website is needed to download but in this app curriculum and academic calendar can be viewed without downloading.There is a secure authentication process for the three panels Students. Teachers and Parents respectively.Parents wil be always updated with the notice from teachers. like parents teacher meeting.Use off social apps like whatsapp can be totally reduced by using this app. students will be provided with every notice from the app itself.App will never disclose any personal information by providing login, logout sessions.
